channel.title: Need Help ASAP
channel.description:
hi, sometimes out of nowhere i start getting this error, and everybody (including me) starts to dc non-stop, until i restart the server. any ideas of what may be causing this problem?
[img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/9985/wtfisthislol.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need Help ASAP
item.dc:creator: @dogs dogs
item.description:
@dogs wrote:

[quote=“smokin flax, post:2, topic:375332”]your server is shit… that means it can’t be online for more than 700-800 mins or else it will DC like mad like what happened to you
i suggest getting a auto restarter and setting the restart time as 120 mins and your problem should be fixed and i also suggest getting a much more stable server…[/quote]
fml lol…

Read full topic
